```{r DESeq2}
## Differential expression WITHOUT SPLITTING BY SEX
# Store data in "../analysis/deseq_timepoints/"
# Format sampledata
sample_data(ps)$Treatment <- as.factor(sample_data(ps)$Treatment)
sample_data(ps)$Age <- as.factor(sample_data(ps)$Age)
# Subset AL/DR
#aldr_comp <- subset_samples(ps, Treatment %in% c("Control", "Rapa Adult"))
#aldr_comp <- subset_samples(ps, Treatment %in% c("Control", "Rapa Early"))
#aldr_comp <- subset_samples(ps, Treatment %in% c("Rapa Adult", "Rapa Early"))
#aldr_comp <- subset_samples(ps, Treatment %in% c("Control", "Rapa Late"))
#aldr_comp <- subset_samples(ps, Treatment %in% c("Rapa Adult", "Rapa Late"))
aldr_comp <- subset_samples(ps, Treatment %in% c("Rapa Late", "Rapa Early"))
# Timepoints to the maximum before reaching only 1 mouse alive of the shortest lived group
timepoint <- c("Young", "Mid", "Old")
timepoint <- c("Mid", "Old")
timepoint <- c("Old")
for (i in 1:length(timepoint)){
  # Subset for months
  comp <- subset_samples(aldr_comp, Age %in% timepoint[[i]])
  
  ds <- phyloseq_to_deseq2(comp, ~Treatment)
  
  # Since these tables have zeroes
  # calculate geometric means prior to estimate size factors
  gm_mean = function(x, na.rm=TRUE){
    exp(sum(log(x[x > 0]), na.rm=na.rm) / length(x))
  }
  geoMeans = apply(counts(ds), 1, gm_mean)
  
  ds = estimateSizeFactors(ds, geoMeans = geoMeans)
  ds = DESeq(ds, fitType="local", test="Wald")
  
  res <- results(ds)
  alpha <- 0.05
  sigtab <- res[which(res$padj < alpha), ]
  sigtab <- cbind(as(sigtab, "data.frame"), as(tax_table(ps)[rownames(sigtab), ], "matrix"))
  
  write.table(sigtab, paste0(project_path, "/analysis/deseq_timepoints/RLRE_", timepoint[i], "_ALL_", new_day, ".csv"), sep=";", quote=F, col.names=NA)
}

ps <- readRDS("~/workspace/MPI/SG_MemoryRapamycin/new_rapamycin/analysis/phyloseq_obj_20240220.rds")
```

```{r}
# Check that all our timepoints have OTUs fitting to negative binomial and can therefore be analyzed by deseq2
for (i in 1:length(timepoint)){
  comp <- subset_samples(aldr_comp, Age %in% timepoint[i])
  nb <- manyglm(otu_table(comp) ~ sample_data(comp)$Treatment, family = "negative_binomial")
  pdf(paste0("~/workspace/MPI/SG_MemoryRapamycin/analysis/deseq_timepoints/neg_binom_", timepoint[i], "_M_", new_day, ".pdf"))
  plot(nb)
  dev.off()
}
```
